alertTextImportSuccessful: Image scan completed. No images imported.|Image scan completed. One image imported.|Image scan completed. {count} images imported.
alertTextImportNoUpdate: Image scan completed. No updates found.
cardTextAddAlbum: To add a new album, please provide a name and an optional description.
errorLoginFourOThree: Invalid credentials. Please check username and password.
formDescriptionTags: Add new tags, confirm each tag with <kbd>enter</kbd>
pageHomeText: The new home for all your photos
pageAboutText:
Frickl is an open source, self-hosted image management tool. Frickl uses your existing image library on your file system or external hard drive and makes it available through a modern and interactive web interface.

Mark photos as your favourites, tag them, look at them on a map or just take pleasure from the fact that all your photos are neatly organised.

It has been written, designed and developed by Sebastian Raubach.
pageAboutCardGithubText: Frickl is completely open source. View the Frickl code on Github.
pageAboutCardDockerText: Want to run Frickl yourself? Pull the Docker image from Docker Hub.
pageAboutCardSponsorText: Has Frickl been useful to you? Please consider sponsoring Sebastian so he can continue the development of Frickl.
pageUsersText: Below is a list of all users which currently have access to Frick. You can change their permissions here, add new users or remove existing users.
tooltipScanImporting: Checking {total} photos for updates. Photos on processing queue: {queue}.
widgetTagsText: The following tags have been associated with this item. Click on a tag to see all images associated with this tag. Click on the x icon (if available) to remove  the tag.
widgetCookieBannerText: Frickl uses cookies to facilitate user login and to remember user preferences.
widgetCookieBannerRejectTooltip: Please be aware that rejecting cookies will disable certain features of Frickl.
